extendedInfo.description: Piggy helps you track and manage your shared expenses. Piggy records and splits the bill of your expenses shared with friends (trips, gifts, purchases) :- share : send email reports to your contacts- keep everything : backup and restore your counts from your SD card- keep track thoroughly : Piggy calculates the general balance of your contacts throughout all your events- keep it clear : you can merge several events into one, archive old ones and restore them when you need it- keep track abroad : you can add any currency you need and set their exchange rates for each event- keep it accurate : exchange rates can be set for each event and weights of people can be set for each expenseTo support Piggy, buy Piggy Donate, you'll get access to Excel export (.csv).Piggy also tracks your debts and IOUs with individual friends (the coffee your paid, the money you lent, etc).You'll always know who owes you what !For comments, suggestion or remarks, send us an email.PS : Piggy is looking for translations. English, French and Italian are currently available. For other languages, feel free to participate !keywords : shared expenses, share, expense, shared, expenses, group, friends, counts, debts, IOU, bill

reviews.title: Must have with friends on weekend or vacations
reviews.comment: Does what it says, nicely, simply and very well. I now offer to do the accounting when sharing expenses with friends and the report is done right at the end with everyone agreeing easily. Great program to facilitate easy things in life
reviews.author: Sylvain Lafond-Phesans

reviews.title: Great app, feature request
reviews.comment: Great app for keeping track of who has paid for what. Intuitive, easy to use. Would be even better if you could email a list of entries to the other person, and also if there was a \'resolve\' feature to archive and start from \302\2430.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Make life easier
reviews.comment: Been using it for a while when take trips with friends, it does an amazing job and it\'s very intuitive. Please make it even better!!
reviews.author: Albert Fabricio

reviews.title: great
reviews.comment: this is exactly what I needed. separated events and one-to-one bills. just add shared expenses (more than 1 person is paying for something) and allow for larger buttons (add some tablet layout)
reviews.author: Peter Ambro\305\276

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Do a good job but UI is sometimes a bit confusing
reviews.author: Jean-Baptiste Richardet

reviews.title: Please add paybacks to avoid confusion
reviews.comment: Hi there it is a great and I have been using it for a some time now. But can you please add the thrid tab under events i.e. Paybacks in the email. Because sometimes it creates confusion to my flatmates if they have already paid some money but that is not listed in the email!! Thanks
reviews.author: kanwalpreet kaur

reviews.title: Best in classs
reviews.comment: Exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Terrific
reviews.comment: Jus found what I looked for!!!
reviews.author: Rajkumar A.A

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Most complete app for bill sharing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great little app .....
reviews.comment: Just what I was looking for - simple, uncomplicated tracking of joint personal expenses with other people. Thank you!

reviews.comment: Just need a better UI

reviews.comment: Fantastic !

reviews.title: Useful application
reviews.comment: Its very useful to me... I am using this from last 3-4 months
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very convenient app..needs some formating tweaks
reviews.comment: Simple and efficient app The interface is best among all other apps. suggestion the final bill reporting can have text warp for names and bills. Please add SMS sharing also. I\'m loving this app... Keep it up.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great app. Would be better if I could change the order of my one to one expenses though...hint hint
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and very useful
reviews.comment: Just came back from 10 days trip with 4 friends, thanks piggy for helped us save time and stress throughout the trip.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good app
reviews.comment: Liked it at first shot. Different and a bit difficult to understand first but then you become a pro after sometime
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Interface not intuitive. Where do I add expense value? Can\'t select other currencies not on list.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
reviews.comment: Three of us are going travelling and I had booked the hostel deposits etc.. Wanted to keep track of how much I was owed (because I swear I always end up paying for loads!) . Piggy suited me perfectly
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Very good yet simple app. Love it.
